link_desc:
Use this template to monitor Checkpoint firewalls hardware status.

****

The following value map must be created for the Checkpoint templates collection :

"Checkpoint standard status"

0 ⇒ OK

1 ⇒ Warning

2 ⇒ Error

The advsnmp.discovery external script (https://github.com/simonkowallik/Zabbix-Addons/tree/master/advsnmp.discovery) is also needed by most templates.

Last, the SNMP items reference the CHECKPOINT-MIB (chkpnt.mib, see https://supportcenter.checkpoint.com/supportcenter/portal?eventSubmit_doGoviewsolutiondetails=&solutionid=sk90470#Check Point SNMP MIB files for all products) so it must be properly installed on your Zabbix server.
